text: Miroslav Indrák (born August 12, 1995) is a Czech professional ice hockey player. He is currently playing for HC Plzeň of the Czech Extraliga. Indrák made his Czech Extraliga debut playing with HC Plzeň during the 2013-14 Czech Extraliga season. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:HC Plzeň players Category:Czech ice hockey forwards Category:People from Písek
title: Miroslav Indrák
